# Ultra-wide band

```{julia}

#| label: fig-uwb-reference pulse
#| fig-cap: "Reference pulse of UWB radio."
#| output: true
#| width: 70%

β = 0.5
Tp = 2e-9
r(t) = 4*β*(cos((1+β)*pi*t/Tp)+sin((1-β)*pi*t/Tp)/(4*β*(t/Tp)))/(pi*sqrt(Tp)*(1-(4*β*t/Tp)^2))

t = LinRange(-8e-9, 8e-9, 1000)
y = r.(t)
y /= maximum(y)

plot(;default_plots..., 
        xlabel="Time [ns]", 
        ylabel="",
        yformatter=Returns("")
    )

plot!(1e9.*t, y)


```
